info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 16 at 4:53PM CDT until July 16 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Bond County in south central Illinois... Southern Montgomery County in south central Illinois... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 452 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mount Olive, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Litchfield, Hillsboro, Taylor Springs, Coffeen, Schram City, Sorento, Van Burensburg, Woburn, Irving, Panama, Fillmore, Donnellson, Butler, Walshville, and Chapman. This includes Interstate 55 in Illinois near exit 52. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
